input_text.css_selector: html > body > div > header > div:nth-of-type(2) > form > input.search-input[type="text"][name="query"][placeholder="Quick search"][aria-label="Search books"]

click_element_by_index.css_selector: html > body > div > header > div:nth-of-type(2) > form > button.search-button[type="submit"]
html > body > div:nth-of-type(2) > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > a.link[href="/ebooks/2701"]

html > body > div > div > div:nth-of-type(2) > div:nth-of-type(4) > div > div > div:nth-of-type(2) > table > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(2) > td:nth-of-type(2) > a.link.read_html[href="/ebooks/2701.html.images"][type="text/html"][title="Read online"]

extract_content.goal: Verify the existence of download links in the 'Read or download for free' section.

done.text: The user successfully found the HTML version of 'Moby Dick' and verified the download options, including EPUB, Kindle, Plain Text, and HTML formats, as expected.
